synopsis.text:
Hook ed by fate, five formidable women—Maki, Naomi, Doris, Marilyn, and Katherine—form the Guard of Rose, a mercenary group entrusted with safeguarding a post-apocalyptic world where the death penalty is abolished. In the heart of a desolate Utah nuclear test site turned maximum-security prison, Neo Purgatory, the Canyon family seizes control, vowing to purge the world of its impurities through nuclear devastation.

As the Guard of Rose investigates whispers of an angel near the prison, their helicopter plummets from the sky, leaving them stranded amidst the chaos. With the clock ticking, the Guard of Rose must confront the Canyon family and their radical plans for global annihilation.

With nuclear missiles poised to strike and the world's superpowers on the brink of surrender, the Guard of Rose stands as humanity's last defense. Will they succeed in thwarting the Canyon family's twisted ambitions, or will the world succumb to a radioactive cleansing? The future hangs in the balance as these courageous women embark on a desperate battle to save mankind.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
